name: Scarlet Rampage
description:
https://twitter.com/kappaminMade for the Touhou Station Jam 2022. The theme we've choose was "Scarlet". 

Someone has stolen Flan's wings and she is now on a rampage to fight her way to find the culprit. In this top-down bullet hell arena arcade game, you do not fear the enemies, but the enemies fear you, as you will hurt anything you touch. Move yourself into enemies and damage them and smack them with your powerful dash slam. However you are not immune to enemy fire. 

Controls:

  • WASD /arrow keys: Move
  • Left Click: Hold to aim your dash and release to dash into your aimed direction. While you aim time is slowed down. You are immune to enemy bullets while you dash.
  • R: Restart

How to Play:

  • Touching an enemy directly will damage them.
  • Damaging an enemy increases your combo which multiplies your score gained from killing enemies. But combos will decay after not dealing damage for a while.
  • Enemy fire can harm you, but enemy bullets are not harmful for half a second after being fired.
  • Survive long enough to clear a stage. After clearing a stage you will heal1 HP. 
  • Clear all the stages to win the game.
  • Focus on constantly dealing damage to keep your combo up can lead to a higher score.
